trends: There have been 24 other sightings in Fort Walton Beach
There were 14 other sightings in Fort Walton Beach on or around March 12th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailstraveling northbound on eglin parkway almost to the intersection of racetrack road and eglin parkway, we noticed several really bright red-orange lights sitting stationary due north towards eglin afb\ crestview. lights were bright and abnormal enough for us (and another car in front of us) to pull off the road into a parking lot to watch. we watched for about 10 minutes. they did not mov. then, they faded out. we went home (about a block away) at the foot of the shalier bridge. we went out on our back deck, and the lights re-appeared. we watched again for approx 30 minutes. when they faded out, it seemed as though the row of lights went out one at a time. there was also clouds in the sky. when the clouds passed in front of the objects, it lit up the clouds. lights were very bright. about a week later (we were out of town), a few of our friends and family observed the same lights in the same vicinity.
Summary: Static orange glowing lights at approx 2-3 miles away
